overview.en: BLC is referred to as BLC. BLC is a global commercial token issued by the Bole Foundation. BLC is a commercial application token issued under the Ethereum ERC20 agreement. The total number of BLC is limited to 520 million, and will be transferred to self-developed in the future. Public chain above Bolecoin.
overview.zh: 伯乐币简称BLC，BLC是由Bole基金会发行的全球通用商业代币，BLC初期是基于以太坊ERC20协议发行的商业应用代币，BLC发行总量限定5.2亿枚，未来会转移到自研的公有链Bolecoin之上。
